# HFO Agent Modes (Active)

This folder is intentionally kept small: it contains only the currently supported/active GitHub agent modes for this workspace.

## Active modes

- **Baseline (MCP grounded):** [hfo-basic-p4.agent.md](hfo-basic-p4.agent.md)
- **Gen88 P3S StrangeLoop (preflight → payload(stigmergy) → postflight → continuity):** [hfo-gen88-p3s.agent.md](hfo-gen88-p3s.agent.md)
- **HIVE/8 Gen88 v4 (scatter→gather P0→P7):** [hfo_hive_8_agent_gen_88_v_4.agent.md](hfo_hive_8_agent_gen_88_v_4.agent.md)

## Archived modes

All other historical/experimental agent modes are archived under:

- [hfo_hot_obsidian_forge/1_silver/2_resources/agents_archive/](../../hfo_hot_obsidian_forge/1_silver/2_resources/agents_archive/)
